thread.title: Godfred Saka: We will fight for CHAN spot against Ivory Coast
thread.title_full: Godfred Saka: We will fight for CHAN spot against Ivory Coast

title: Godfred Saka: We will fight for CHAN spot against Ivory Coast
text:
Sports News | 21 October 2015 11:25 CET Godfred Saka: We will fight for CHAN spot against Ivory Coast - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana and Aduana Stars defender Godfred Saka says he understand the herculean task awaiting them in Abidjan but was prepared to die for the nation. 
Coach Maxwell Konadu's side recovered from goal down to narrowly win 2-1 at home in the first leg encounter. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
